original_text: For they prophesy a lie unto you, to remove you far from your land; and that I should drive you out, and ye should perish.
korean_text: 그들은 너희에게 거짓을 예언하여 너희가 너희 땅에서 멀리 떠나게 하며 또 내가 너희를 몰아내게 하며 너희를 멸망하게 하느니라

sentences.original_text: For they prophesy a lie unto you
to remove you far from your land
sentences.korean_translation: 너희를 너희 땅에서 멀리 옮기려 함이라

sentences.original_text: and that I should drive you out
